title: 1.3 Graphing Data with Chart.js
description: The lesson continues working with tabular data (CSV) and examines how to graph the data in an HTML5 canvas with Chart.js.

timestamps.title: What have we done so far?
How do we get our data onto the chart?

links.title: Chart.js
